output.sentences: I wasn't very capable with computers, but had heard that you could use them to make some neat projects.
I decided to sleep on the idea and see if I could screw up enough courage to try to use the technology to make something.
I awoke early the next morning, before the sun came up and started researching what I needed to learn in order to make my craft
I gathered up several items I already had around my house, and began my project.
When I was done, even though it was a little rough around the edges, I was proud enough of it to display it on the kitchen table as a center piece.
